mapper.insert: UPDATE tb_img_file_info SET file_nm=#{file_nm}, file_path=#{file_path}, file_size=#{file_size}, file_format=#{file_format}, img_width=#{img_width}, img_height=#{img_height} WHERE img_no = (SELECT biz_img_no FROM tb_user WHERE user_no = #{user_no})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, u.company_nm, u.biz_reg_number, u.ceo_nm, u.biz_category, s.shipto_addr1 as biz_addr_1, s.shipto_addr2 as biz_addr_2, u.contact_tel, u.tax_email, u.manager_nm, u.manager_tel, u.manager_email, s.post_code, u.reg_dt, u.upd_dt, u.biz_img_no, i.file_nm FROM tb_user u INNER JOIN tb_img_file_info i ON u.biz_img_no = i.img_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_shipto_addr s ON (u.user_no = s.user_no AND s.main_shipping = 'Y') WHERE 1=1 AND u.user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user( user_id, company_nm, biz_reg_number, ceo_nm, biz_category, post_code, biz_addr_1, biz_addr_2, contact_tel, tax_email, manager_nm, manager_tel, manager_email, reg_dt, upd_dt, biz_img_no ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{company_nm}, #{biz_reg_number}, #{ceo_nm}, '', #{post_code}, #{biz_addr_1}, #{biz_addr_2}, '', #{tax_email}, #{manager_nm}, #{manager_tel}, #{manager_email}, now(), now(), #{biz_img_no} )

INSERT INTO tb_shipto_addr( user_no, receiver_nm, shipto_addr1, shipto_addr2, receiver_tel, reg_dt, shipto_no, shipto_nm, upd_dt, post_code, main_shipping ) VALUES ( (SELECT user_no FROM tb_user WHERE user_id = #{user_id}), #{receiver_nm}, #{shipto_addr1}, #{shipto_addr2}, #{receiver_tel}, NOW(), #{shipto_no}, #{shipto_nm}, NOW(), #{post_code}, 'Y' )

UPDATE tb_user SET company_nm = #{company_nm}, biz_reg_number= #{biz_reg_number}, ceo_nm= #{ceo_nm}, biz_category= #{biz_category}, contact_tel= #{contact_tel}, tax_email= #{tax_email}, manager_nm= #{manager_nm}, manager_tel= #{manager_tel}, manager_email= #{manager_email}, upd_dt = NOW() WHERE user_no = #{user_no}
